official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim September 8 of each year as "National Cancer Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President of the United States to issue a proclamation each year designating September 8 as "National Cancer Day".

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim September 8 of each year as "National Cancer Day".
